Package dat3.kino.services

Class AuditoriumService

java.lang.Object
dat3.kino.services.AuditoriumService
@Service public class AuditoriumService extends Object
Service class for managing auditoriums.

  • Method Details

    • createAuditorium

      public AuditoriumResponse createAuditorium(Auditorium newAuditorium, int rows, int seatsPerRow)
      Creates a new auditorium with the specified number of rows and seats per row.
      Parameters:
      newAuditorium - The new auditorium to be created.
      rows - The number of rows in the auditorium.
      seatsPerRow - The number of seats per row in the auditorium.
      Returns:
      The created auditorium.

    • readSingleAuditorium

      public AuditoriumResponse readSingleAuditorium(Long id)
      Retrieves a single auditorium by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the auditorium to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The retrieved auditorium.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - If no auditorium with the specified ID is found.
